mapper.select: select b.*, ab.ab_no, ab.ab_type from b b join ab ab on b.b_no = ab.b_no join (select max(ap_no), ap_b_no, ap_state from ap group by ap_b_no, ap_state) ap on b.b_no = ap.ap_b_no where b.c_username = #{c_username} and ( ap.ap_state = 1 or ap.ap_state = 4 )
select d.* from ab ab join d d on ab.b_no = d.b_no where ab.ab_no = #{ab_no}
select rb.*, s.s_name from rb rb join s s on rb.s_no = s.s_no where b_no = #{b_no} order by rb.r_turn

select ur.ur_no, u.u_type, ur.ur_date, ur.ur_state, rb.r_turn ur_start_turn, rb2.r_turn ur_last_turn from ur ur left join rb rb on ur.s_nostart = rb.s_no join rb rb2 on ur.s_nolast = rb2.s_no join u u on ur.u_username = u.u_username where (ur_state = 0 or ur_state = 1) and rb.b_no = #{b_no} and rb2.b_no = #{b_no}
select count(ab_no) from ab where ab_no = #{ab_no}
mapper.update: update ab set r_turn = #{car}, d_no = #{d_no}, ab_wheel_cnt = #{wheel}, ab_blind_cnt = #{blind} where ab_no = #{ab_no}
update ur set ur_state = 1 where ur_no = #{data}
update ur set ur_state = 3 where ur_no = #{data}
